reviews.review_content:
Professor Kaye is a good professor. He is open to any/all views and allows for a genuine dialogue in the classroom. However, the extent to which he lets class discussion take over his lectures can be frustrating. The same things would be said over and over for 20 minutes--time that could be spent actually learning more of the material. He is an easy grader--but the TA grades the major assignments and she was super harsh so watch out! Really interesting material, and varied assignments however. I would recommend the class overall.
Workload:
not too bad, 4 responses to the reading, a film review, midterm and final paper. all fairly graded (although I though a bit harsh for the final paper)
